/bin/bash -lc 'python manage.py migrate && cat <<"PYTHON" | python manage.py shell
import os
from django.contrib.auth import get_user_model

username = os.environ.get("DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME")
password = os.environ.get("DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD")
email = os.environ.get("DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL")

if not username or not password:
    print("Superuser variables missing")
else:
    if not email:
        email = f"{username}@example.com"
    User = get_user_model()
    defaults = {"email": email, "is_staff": True, "is_superuser": True, "is_active": True}
    if any(field.name == "role" for field in User._meta.fields):
        defaults["role"] = "admin"
    user, created = User.objects.update_or_create(username=username, defaults=defaults)
    user.set_password(password)
    user.save()
    print("Superuser ensured", "created" if created else "updated")
PYTHON'
